com.facebook.rendercore.extensions

Class RenderCoreExtension<Input,State>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.rendercore.extensions.RenderCoreExtension<Input,State>
  • Type Parameters:
    Input - the state the extension operates on.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IncrementalMountRenderCoreExtension, VisibilityExtension

    public class RenderCoreExtension<Input,State>
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for all RenderCore Extensions.

      Should return a new Input > to which the LayoutResultVisitor can write into.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderCoreExtension

        public RenderCoreExtension()

    • Method Detail

      • getLayoutVisitor

        public LayoutResultVisitor<? extends Input> getLayoutVisitor()
        The extension can optionally return a LayoutResultVisitor for every layout pass which will visit every Node.LayoutResult. The visitor should be functional and immutable.
        Returns:
        a LayoutResultVisitor.

      • getMountExtension

        public MountExtension<? extends Input,State> getMountExtension()
        The extension can optionally return a MountExtension which can be used to augment the RenderCore's mounting phase. The Input > collected in the latest layout pass will be passed to the extension before mount.
        Returns:
        a MountExtension.

      • createInput

        public Input createInput()
        Should return a new Input > to which the LayoutResultVisitor can write into.
        Returns:
        A new Input > for LayoutResultVisitor to write into.

      • beforeMount

        public static void beforeMount(MountDelegateTarget mountDelegateTarget,
                               Host host,
                               java.util.Map<RenderCoreExtension<?,?>,java.lang.Object> results)
        Calls MountExtension.beforeMount(ExtensionState, Object, Rect) for each RenderCoreExtension that has a mount phase.
        Parameters:
        host - The Host of the extensions
        results - A map of RenderCoreExtension to their results from the layout phase.

      • afterMount

        public static void afterMount(MountDelegateTarget mountDelegateTarget,
                              java.util.Map<RenderCoreExtension<?,?>,java.lang.Object> results)
        Calls MountExtension.afterMount(ExtensionState) for each RenderCoreExtension that has a mount phase.
        Parameters:
        results - A map of RenderCoreExtension to their results from the layout phase.

      • notifyVisibleBoundsChanged

        public static void notifyVisibleBoundsChanged(MountDelegateTarget mountDelegateTarget,
                                              Host host,
                                              java.util.Map<RenderCoreExtension<?,?>,java.lang.Object> results)
        Calls MountExtension.onVisibleBoundsChanged(ExtensionState, Rect) for each RenderCoreExtension that has a mount phase.
        Parameters:
        host - The Host of the extensions
        results - A map of RenderCoreExtension to their results from the layout phase.

      • shouldUpdate

        public static boolean shouldUpdate(java.util.Map<RenderCoreExtension<?,?>,java.lang.Object> currentResults,
                                   java.util.Map<RenderCoreExtension<?,?>,java.lang.Object> nextResults)
        returns false iff the results have the same RenderCoreExtensions.
